Action.body: Installed-Size: 10.2 kB Depends: python3-sawtooth-cli, python3-sawtooth-config, python3-sawtooth-intkey, python3-sawtooth-manage, python3-sawtooth-poet-common, python3-sawtooth-poet-core, python3-sawtooth-poet-families, python3-sawtooth-poet-simulator, python3-sawtooth-rest-api, python3-sawtooth-sdk, python3-sawtooth-signing, python3-sawtooth-validator, python3-sawtooth-xo Homepage: https://01.org/sawtooth Download-Size: 2,220 B APT-Manual-Installed: yes APT-Sources: http://repo.sawtooth.me/ubuntu/0.8/stable xenial/universe amd64 Packages Description: Hyperledger Sawtooth Distributed Ledger >
